properties.address: Moncreiff Parish Church, South Lanarkshire G74 3JJ
properties.description: Thursday mornings 9am - 1pm term time and 10am - 1pm during school holidays. Tea, coffee, toast, light snacks and from around noon soup and a roll. Meeting in the cafe area of the Sanctuary and open to all. Drop in for a while or stay all morning. Play board games, bring your crafts and have a good blether. Lots of practical hep and advice along with sign posting to other relevant sources. CAP Debt Help drop in - no appointment needed. Blankets and new hot water bottles to take away. Battery packs available. Charge your devices. Use our laptops.
